IndexPage.title: Ecommerce - wefixit
IndexPage.description: E-commerce is the buying and selling of goods and services over the internet. It offers convenience, a wide selection, and competitive pricing. Businesses leverage e-commerce to reach a global audience, streamline operations, and enhance customer experience through personalized services and efficient delivery systems.

AboutPage.title: About
AboutPage.description: we believe shopping should be a delightful experience. Founded in [Year], we have grown from a small startup into a trusted online marketplace. Our mission is to bring you the best products from around the world, right to your doorstep.

NotFoundPage.title: Page Not Found
NotFoundPage.description: Oops! It seems like you've stumbled upon a page that doesn't exist. Don't worry, our internationalization magic is still hard at work on other parts of the app. Feel free to navigate back to explore more!
